invocations.description: Looks for a hotkey in the game client which is bound to the item with id itemid and returns it as a string representation of the keys in the format 'F1', 'Shift+F5', or 'Ctrl+F12', and 'not found' if there is no such hotkey. Optionally, you can specify a type by passing 'self', 'target', 'equip' or 'crosshair' as the type parameter if you're looking for a certain type specifically. Otherwise, any type will be looked for.
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
if clientitemhotkey(268, 'self') == 'not found' then
	traymessage('', 'WARNING! You don\'t have a hotkey on the client to use mana potions', 2000) wait(1000)
end
invocations.exDescription: Will show a warning if you don't have a hotkey on the client to use mana potions on yourself.
